data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure (Ultrasound Workstation), Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANKSBP01
variable.description: 1st Ankle systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ANKSBP02
variable.description: 2nd Ankle systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ANKSBP03
variable.description: 3rd Ankle systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ANKSBP04
variable.description: 4th Ankle systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ARMSBP01
variable.description: 1st Brachial systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ARMSBP02
variable.description: 2nd Brachial systolic blood pressure reading [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ARBPAV01
variable.description: Average brachial systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ANBPAV01
variable.description: Average Ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: ABI01
variable.description: Ankle-Brachial index return [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 1]
